fields.title: The Ring of Waterâ€™s Beginning
fields.description: In this stage, craft fundamental loops to extinguish multiple fires, relocate moving bridges, and build barriers.

fields.title: Test of Conditionals & Decision
fields.description: Use conditional statements to open dams only when needed, clear mist correctly, and unlock secret chests.

fields.title: Chains of Recursion
fields.description: Employ recursive functions to chain spells together and defeat moving foes with rapid-fire attacks.

fields.title: Data Structures & Composite Algorithms
fields.description: Leverage arrays and dictionaries to generate advanced rune combinations and solve intricate puzzles.

fields.title: Final Battle with the Chaos Dragon
fields.description: Combine all learned skills to write the ultimate combat algorithm and vanquish the Chaos Dragon.
